nodes.text: Arago Tanca was an outlaw tech that specialized in designing and building extreme structures. He had years of experience in zero-g and hard-vacuum construction. He would hire himself out to any customer and avoided discussing his personal feelings on any job. He was often used to build asteroid bases.
Tanca was extremely secretive. He would not divulge his thoughts on politics or beliefs nor give out any specifics on jobs he had done in the past. If pressed, he would get upset and quit.
